content.query:
CREATE DATABASE DataExplorationDB 
                COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8

                USE DataExplorationDB

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ragContosoLake
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://ragcontosolake.dfs.core.windows.net')

    CREATE LOGIN data_explorer WITH PASSWORD = 'Govinda123#';
CREATE USER data_explorer FOR LOGIN data_explorer;
GO
GRANT ADMINISTER DATABASE BULK OPERATIONS TO data_explorer;
GO

SELECT
   TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK '/users/yellow_tripdata_2022-01.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'ragContosoLake',
            FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
